newsitem.title: USA: Int'l Nursing amends Q3, 1996 yr results.
newsitem.headline: Int'l Nursing amends Q3, 1996 yr results.

text.p: International Nursing Services Inc said Friday that, because of an accounting adjustment required by the Securities and Exchange Commission, it restated its results for the third quarter ended September 30, 1996 and the year ended December 30, 1996.

It said that for the quarter ended September 30, loss per common share was restated to $0.42 from $.02. For the nine months ended September 30, the restatement resulted in a net loss per share of $0.34, from a net income of $0.04, it said.
It said its restated loss per common share for the year ended December 29, 1996 was $0.57, from $0.19.
The restated results stem from a new calculation of the company's weighted average shares outstanding arising from the required SEC adjustment, it said.
The restatement was in response to the SEC requirement that all companies with convertible debt transaction account for the discount unpon conversion as an additional interest expense, it said.
